meanings.definition: The state of being an outsider or not belonging to a particular group or community.
meanings.sent1: Her outsiderness at school made her feel lonely.
meanings.sent2: The feeling of outsiderness can be difficult to overcome.
meanings.sent3: His outsiderness in the new club led to some funny misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The outsiderness she felt was like being on the outside looking in.
meanings.sent5: The outsiderness of the new student was evident in the way they hesitated to join conversations.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being on the outside or exterior of something.
meanings.sent1: The outsiderness of the house was noticeable due to its unique design.
meanings.sent2: The outsiderness of the building made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent3: The outsiderness of the car's color made it easy to spot in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The outsiderness of the tree in the field gave it a majestic presence.
meanings.sent5: The outsiderness of the fence indicated the boundary of the property.
